title: Token Balance Snapshot
description: Use this tool to find holders of tokens or NFTs - you can then copy the list as a CSV for use in other tools such as the Airdrop Manager.
tokenIdFormatError: TokenId must be in the format 0.0.x
minAmountFormatError: MinAmount must be a number greater than or equal to 0
wrongTokenId: Wrong token ID! Please provide a valid token ID.
nonFungibleMinAmountFormatError: For Fungible token minAmount can't be a number with more decimals than
durationLabel: Select duration type and provide value
